author: foxnews.com
title: Why Lady Gaga slapped Taylor Kinney when they first met
text:
Published October 15, 2015 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print
Lady Gaga was not smitten with her fiance Taylor Kinney upon first laying eyes on him.
In fact, the handsome "Chicago P.D." star told "Watch What Happens" host Andy Cohen that Gaga slapped him during their initial meeting.
PHOTOS: Mrs. Taylor Kinney?! Lady Gaga Is a Beautiful Bride in New Fashion Spread
Kinney was first introduced to Mother Monster on set of her music video "You and I" in 2011. "I show up and they're like, 'Oh this is the idea. This is the idea.' and I go, 'OK, just let me do my thing," he recalled. "And I remember I went up, and we're rolling, and I kissed her and she didn't expect it. They cut, and she slapped me."
While the first take was "awkward," Kinney and Gaga moved passed it. "The next take, I just did it again and then she didn't slap me. She didn't slap me then. We had a good time," he quipped. "I think there was chemistry. It was a late shoot. We were shooting until four or five in the morning. We exchanged information. A few weeks went by and we kept in touch and then that's that."
WATCH: Lady Gaga Makes Red Hot Rare Appearance With Fianc√© Taylor Kinney at American Horror Story Premiere
